Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

Class Attribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.Attribute
  • public class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
    A key-value attribute for spans, events, or resources. Supports string, boolean, long, and double value types.
    Author:
    Chris Burdess

    • Field Summary

      static int TYPE_DOUBLE

      static int TYPE_STRING
      Attribute value types matching OTLP AnyValue.

        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the type is not TYPE_STRING
